details:
noun
- the act of filling something
- a dental appliance consisting of any of various substances, such as metal or plastic, inserted into a prepared cavity in a tooth
= example: a dental appliance consisting of any of various substances, such as metal or plastic, inserted into a prepared cavity in a tooth
- the yarn woven across the warp yarn in weaving
= synonyms: pick
- a food mixture used to fill pastry or sandwiches etc.
- flow into something (as a container)
- any material that fills a space or container
= synonyms: fill
